<<<<<<< HEAD
At a general court held at Boston in the year [lacuna] by the court, Edward Rawson, secretary. Massachusetts. General Court. Rawson, Edward, 1615-1693.
1 broadside.
Printed by Samuel Green, [Cambridge, Mass. : 1688?]
Ordering the constables of the towns of the colony to report on the education of children. First line of text reads: It is ordered by the court and the authority thereof that the following order shall be directed ... Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints. Imperfect: page faded with slight loss of print. Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
